import React ,{useState} from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./index.css"; import "./style.css"; import Home from "./views/home"; import Contact from "./views/Contact"; import Login from "./views/Login"; const App = () => { const [hide,setHide]=useState("hide") const hideHandler = ()=>{ if(hide=="hide"){ setHide("no") }else{ setHide("hide") } } return ( {/* nave bar start */}

    {/* nave bar end */} {/* body start */}
